wikipedia_page.main: Monique Gladding (born 17 June 1981 in Durban, South Africa) is a South African-born British diver. She competed for Great Britain in the 10 metre platform event at the 2012 Summer Olympics.

link_mentions.page: Diving at the 2009 World Aquatics Championships – Women's synchronized 10 metre platform

Diving at the 2012 European Aquatics Championships – Women's 10 m platform

response: She competed at the 2006 Commonwealth Games in the 10 m synchro event with Monique Gladding.  The team finished in fifth.  She competed in the same event at the 2010 Commonwealth Games, this time with Tonia Couch.  They finished fourth, and replicated this result at the 2011 European Championships.
* Monique Gladding (b. 1981), South African-born British diver
